# Availability Flags

**API Collection**

Obtain the availability of particular vImage features.

## Constants

- **VIMAGE_AFFINETRANSFORM_DOUBLE_IS_AVAILABLE**: Defined as `1` if double-precision affine transforms and related functions are supported on the current architecture and in the current SDK, else undefined. See [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vImage_AffineTransform_Double] for more information.
- **VIMAGE_CGAFFINETRANSFORM_IS_AVAILABLE**: Defined as `1` if Core Graphics affine transforms and related functions are supported on the current architecture and in the current SDK, else undefined. See [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vImage_CGAffineTransform] for more information.

## Constants

- **Error codes**: Error codes that vImage functions return when an operation fails.
- **Core Video Image Format Errors**
- **Processing Flags**: Set flags on vImage operations to specify processing options.
- **Dithering Methods**: Specify the dithering method some vImage conversion functions use.
- **Decode Arrays**: Specify the decode array constant to use with 16Q12-formatted data.
- **Buffer Types**: Look up buffer type codes vImage conversions provide.
- **vImageMatrixType**: An enumeration of RGB -> Y’CbCr conversion matrix types.
- **vImage_WarpInterpolation**: Constants for selecting the interpolation mode
